description:
Rima is an energetic and perverted warrior with a rape fetish.
she is rarly serious or scared about anything.
According to her Partner Kuri she will have sex with just about anyone or anything.
not to unlikely as she willingly let a tentacle monster violate her.
Rima has the power to transform into Yarima Koun,
Turning her into a more adult woman, with a special armor and a sword.
she can also use Pyrokinetics in this form.
name: Rima
